com.unitedcaterers.client

Class SocketClientConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.unitedcaterers.client.SocketClientConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UCServer, java.rmi.Remote

    public class SocketClientConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements UCServer
    This class is the client side counterpart of the socket based UCServer. In a way, this serves the same purpose as a stub class of the RMI server. This class's responsibilty is to handle the remoting mechanism (marshalling and unmarshalling) of the request and response.
